page.title: 03A BRANT BROUGHTON SCHOOL DAY
page.content: On Monday I get up at about 8.00 and go down for breakfast. I have two pieces of toast and a cup of tea.After breakfast I get dressed, pack my bag and set off to school.I go into the classroom, get my pen and reading book,put them on my desk and play until the bell goes.We have assembly and then do spelling dictionary work until break(10.30).After break we do peak maths until lunch(11.55).We have a packed lunch which we bring with us.Lunch finishes at 12.55.After lunch we read and do topic work until 1.45.Then we have P.E. until break (2.15-2.30).After break we continue topic until 3.00.At 3.00 Mr Leverett reads us a story until 3.25.3.25 is the time we go home,after we have put up our chairs.The infants leave at 3.10.Children who live at surrounding villages catch their bus at 3.20.
